column4: ive installed XGL + Compiz and its loadet success fully but now i cannot start AMSN whats the problem?
anything to add to that? we cannot see what kind of errors you have on the screen you know..
there is no error at all it just stops running
execute amsn in a terminal window and pastebin what you see (you're dutch i presume..)
watch ur pm
ive seen this error befor on google
u still here?
the error of AMSN is: Application initialization failed: this isn't a Tk applicationunknown color name "Black"
hmm doesn't sound familiar, lets google it. one moment please
i did almost every thing what ive found on google
did you try this one
replace the /usr/lib/tk8.5/tkfbox.tcl that comes with tk8.5_8.5.0-1~neto3_i386.deb package with the one from http://tktoolkit.cvs.sourceforge.net...?revision=1.58
if i am correct ive followed this guide: http://www.ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-87001.html
your problem has to do with a faulty xorg installation
with means i have to reboot o.0
no just read this http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=216689&page=4
you will find a couple of solutions there

how do i do this: If you are using xgl, you most probably have the file rgb.txt in /etc/X11 . Xgl in Ubuntu Dapper is usually misconfigured and looks for the file in /usr/share/X11 . Make a symlink to it in /usr/share/X11 and restart your X server.
ln -s /etc/X11/rgb.txt /usr/share/X11 and then ctrl-alt-Bksp
be sure to use sudo!
i did that a while aggo o.0
only a restart of gnome is enough?
you have to restart X
